description: Her career spanned eight decades and she charmed audiences in France and beyond.
title: Juliette Gr¨¦co: Doyenne of French singers dies at 93
title_page: Juliette Gr¨¦co: Doyenne of French singers dies at 93 - BBC News
maintext: But she was loved internationally too, from Germany to Japan and beyond. In 1967, she sang in front of 60,000 people in Berlin and in 2005 released an album of songs in German.
